author: Chris Hannah
description: This spirit-forward, herbal and bitter-sweet cocktail was originally served without ice but dilution tames its fire to appeal to a wider audience as an after-dinner digestif.
name: Bywater
recipeIngredient: 50 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass (optionally over a chunk of block ice)
